modern.translation[0].definitions[0].def: belonging to the present time or most recent time
modern.translation[0].definitions[0].not: Modern Greek/Hebrew etc (=the form of the language used today)
modern.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Such companies must change if they are to compete in the modern world.
They are the youngest children in modern times to face murder charges.
Smaller families are a feature of modern society.
Computers are an essential part of modern life.
The original supermarkets were small by modern standards.
modern.translation[0].definitions[1].def: made or done using the most recent designs or methods
modern.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: A lot of progress has been made with the use of modern technology.
modern.translation[0].definitions[2].def: modern art, music, literature etc uses styles that have been recently developed and are very different from traditional styles
modern.translation[0].definitions[3].def: having very recent attitudes or ways of behaving
modern.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: The school is very modern in its approach to sex education.
modern.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: The island has hardly been affected by the modern world.
In modern society, elderly relatives rarely live with their children.
It was one of the greatest disasters of modern times.
In the modern age, television is the main means of mass communication.
These problems are a major part of modern life.
Modern man gets much less exercise in his daily life than his ancestors.
French, German and other modern languages
In their own minds they are the modern equivalent of highwaymen.
modern.translation[0].note_box[1].sectio: something that is modern uses the most recent designs or methods
the city’s modern public transportation system
The camera uses the latest digital technology.
using the most modern technology, ideas, information etc
The hospital has the most up-to-date equipment in the country.
modern – used when you disapprove of something and do not think it as good as the things that existed before
He doesn’t believe in these new-fangled gadgets.
using very advanced technology, especially electronic equipment and computers
Modern tractors are full of high-tech equipment, including GPS.
using the newest and most advanced features, ideas, and materials that are available
The brand new arts centre is state-of-the-art.
